Partner with Thorbis

Help service companies unlock AI-driven growth

Thorbis partners expand what's possible for contractors. Join our ecosystem to deliver AI-enabled workflows, seamless integrations, and consultative expertise that accelerate customer outcomes.

Apply to become a partnerAccess partner resources
Partnership Types

Choose the partnership that fits

Multiple paths to grow with Thorbis and deliver value to contractors.

Solution partners
Consultancies and agencies that implement, optimize, and operate Thorbis on behalf of joint customers. Receive enablement, co-marketing, and revenue share.
Co-marketing support
Revenue share
Dedicated partner manager
Integration partners
Software vendors that connect into Thorbis via our APIs to deliver seamless workflows across accounting, financing, marketing, and field operations.
API access & sandbox
Joint go-to-market
Technical support
Referral partners
Organizations that recommend Thorbis to service companies, from distributors to training providers. Earn referral incentives and early roadmap access.
Referral commissions
Early roadmap access
Partner badge

Open APIs & SDKs

Access training, resources, and co-marketing assets.

Dedicated support

Technical and business support from our partner team.

Ecosystem

Integrations our customers rely on

Thorbis integrates with the systems contractors depend on. Our open APIs and SDKs let you build deep, reliable connections.

Stripe, Authorize.net, Sunbit, GreenSky
HubSpot, Mailchimp, ActiveCampaign
Google Ads, Meta Ads, CallRail
Fleetio, Verizon Connect, Samsara
